00034 namespace scene

00038         class EffectManager;
00039 
00042         class OUTILS_API Effect
00043         {
00044         public:
00045                 Effect(EffectManager* mng);
00046 
00047                 void setProgram(GpuProgram* program) { myProgram = program; }
00048                 GpuProgram* getProgram() { return myProgram; }
00049                 
00050                 void activate();
00051                 void deactivate();
00052 
00053                 GpuProgramParams& getParams() { return myParams; }
00054 
00056                 void setColor(float r = 1.0f, float g = 1.0f, float b = 1.0f, float a = 1.0f) { myDiffuseColor = Color(r, g, b, a); myAmbientColor = Color(r, g, b, a); }
00057                 void setColor(const Color& value) { myDiffuseColor = value; mySpecularColor = value; myAmbientColor = value;}
00058 
00059                 void setDiffuseColor(float r = 1.0f, float g = 1.0f, float b = 1.0f, float a = 1.0f) { myDiffuseColor = Color(r, g, b, a); }
00060                 void setDiffuseColor(const Color& value) { myDiffuseColor = value; }
00061                 Color getDiffuseColor() { return myDiffuseColor; }
00062 
00063                 void setSpecularColor(float r = 1.0f, float g = 1.0f, float b = 1.0f, float a = 1.0f) { mySpecularColor = Color(r, g, b, a); }
00064                 void setSpecularColor(const Color& value) { mySpecularColor = value; }
00065                 Color getSpecularColor() { return mySpecularColor; }
00066 
00067                 void setAmbientColor(float r = 1.0f, float g = 1.0f, float b = 1.0f, float a = 1.0f) { myAmbientColor = Color(r, g, b, a); }
00068                 void setAmbientColor(const Color& value) { myAmbientColor = value; }
00069                 Color getAmbientColor() { return myAmbientColor; }
00070 
00071                 void setEmissiveColor(float r = 1.0f, float g = 1.0f, float b = 1.0f, float a = 1.0f) { myEmissiveColor = Color(r, g, b, a); }
00072                 void setEmissiveColor(const Color& value) { myEmissiveColor = value; }
00073                 Color getEmissiveColor() { return myEmissiveColor; }
00074 
00075                 void setShininess(float value) { myShininess = value; }
00076                 float getShininess() { return myShininess; }
00077 
00078         private:
00079                 EffectManager* myMng;
00080                 GpuProgram* myProgram;
00081                 GpuProgramParams myParams;
00082                 Color myDiffuseColor;
00083                 Color mySpecularColor;
00084                 Color myAmbientColor;
